title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Manage AI providers, models, assistants, and contexts for the application.

settingsTab.title: AI Engine Configurations
settingsTab.description: Create and manage connections with different AI providers and their models.

formDialog.description: Define the connection details for an AI model.
formDialog.nameDescription: A friendly name to identify this setup.
formDialog.modelIdDescription: The specific identifier of the model from the provider.

zod.apiKeyRequired: A custom API Key is required if you are not using the default.

formDialog.useDefaultApiKeyDescription: If enabled, it will use the key defined in the system environment variables.
formDialog.apiKeyDescription: Use this to override the system's default key.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the configuration "{name}"? Assistants using this configuration will stop working.

toasts.duplicatingDescription: The configuration for "{name}" is ready to be saved as a copy.
toasts.saveSuccessDescription: The AI configuration has been successfully saved.

assistantsTab.title: AI Assistants
assistantsTab.description: Create and manage your AI 'pilots'. Each assistant has a personality and a specific function.

formDialog.description: Define the personality, capabilities, and engine for this AI assistant.
formDialog.typeDescription: The type cannot be changed after creation.
formDialog.configDescription: The AI model this assistant will use.
formDialog.systemPromptPlaceholderText: You are a helpful and friendly assistant. You always answer in Portuguese...
formDialog.systemPromptPlaceholderOther: Describe the scene for the image/video or the characteristics of the voice...
formDialog.contextFilesPlaceholder: Functionality under development. Here you will be able to upload PDFs, tables, etc.

zod.typeRequired: You must select an assistant type.
zod.configRequired: You must select an AI engine configuration.
zod.systemPromptRequired: The system prompt is required for text-based assistants.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the assistant "{name}"? This may affect contexts that are using it.

toasts.duplicatingDescription: The assistant "{name}" is ready to be saved as a copy.
toasts.saveSuccessDescription: The AI assistant has been successfully saved.

contextsTab.title: AI Context Management
contextsTab.description: Assign a specific AI Assistant to each context of use in the system. Configurations here override master settings.

toasts.saveSuccessDescription: The AI context assignments have been updated.

monitoringTab.title: Interaction Monitoring
monitoringTab.description: View the recent history of all calls made to the AI assistants.

testTab.title: Test Assistants
testTab.description: Run real-time tests with your configured assistants to check their responses, prompts, and settings.
testTab.promptPlaceholder: Type your question or instruction here...
testTab.unsupportedBrowser: Your browser does not support the audio element.
testTab.invalidInput: Select an assistant and enter a prompt.

debugTab.title: AI Debug Tab
debugTab.description: Use this section to run isolated diagnostic tests on the AI capabilities.

tts.title: Audio Generation Test (Text-to-Speech)
tts.description: Enter text and run tests to generate audio using different backend methods. This helps diagnose connectivity and configuration issues with TTS APIs.
tts.label: Text to Convert to Audio
tts.testCompleteDesc: The result (audio or error) is displayed below.
